title: Two Sum
description:
Given an array of integers nums and an integer target, return indices of the two numbers such that they add up to target.

You may assume that each input would have exactly one solution, and you may not use the same element twice.
task:
Find two numbers in the array that add up to the target value.
Return their 0-based indices in any order.
inputFormat:
Line 1:N — the length of the array
Line 2..N+1:Array elements as integers
Line N+2:target — the target sum
outputFormat: Two space-separated integers representing the 0-based indices of the two numbers that add up to the target.
sampleInput:
// Array size

6

//array elements

2 7 11 15

// Target sum

8
hints: A brute force approach checks every pair — O(n²) time complexity
Can you use extra space to reduce time complexity?
A HashMap can help you find the complement in O(1)
